00102 /***************************************************************************/
00110 static uint32_t auxClkGet(void)
00111 {
00112   uint32_t ret;
00113 
00114 #if defined( _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_FREQRANGE_MASK )
00115   ret = auxHfrcoFreq;
00116 
00117 #elif defined( _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_BAND_MASK )
00118   /* All Geckos from TG and newer */
00119   switch(CMU->AUXHFRCOCTRL & _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_BAND_MASK)
00120   {
00121     case CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_BAND_1MHZ:
00122       ret = 1000000;
00123       break;
00124 
00125     case CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_BAND_7MHZ:
00126       ret = 7000000;
00127       break;
00128 
00129     case CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_BAND_11MHZ:
00130       ret = 11000000;
00131       break;
00132 
00133     case CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_BAND_14MHZ:
00134       ret = 14000000;
00135       break;
00136 
00137     case CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_BAND_21MHZ:
00138       ret = 21000000;
00139       break;
00140 
00141 #if defined( _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_BAND_28MHZ )
00142     case CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_BAND_28MHZ:
00143       ret = 28000000;
00144       break;
00145 #endif
00146 
00147     default:
00148       EFM_ASSERT(0);
00149       ret = 0;
00150       break;
00151   }
00152 
00153 #else
00154   /* Gecko has a fixed 14Mhz AUXHFRCO clock */
00155   ret = 14000000;
00156 
00157 #endif
00158 
00159   return ret;
00160 }

00163 /***************************************************************************/
00170 static uint32_t dbgClkGet(void)
00171 {
00172   uint32_t ret;
00173   CMU_Select_TypeDef clk;
00174 
00175   /* Get selected clock source */
00176   clk = CMU_ClockSelectGet(cmuClock_DBG);
00177 
00178   switch(clk)
00179   {
00180     case cmuSelect_HFCLK:
00181       ret = SystemHFClockGet();
00182 #if defined( _CMU_CTRL_HFCLKDIV_MASK )
00183       /* Family with an additional divider. */
00184       ret = ret / (1 + ((CMU->CTRL & _CMU_CTRL_HFCLKDIV_MASK)
00185                         >> _CMU_CTRL_HFCLKDIV_SHIFT));
00186 #endif
00187       break;
00188 
00189     case cmuSelect_AUXHFRCO:
00190       ret = auxClkGet();
00191       break;
00192 
00193     default:
00194       EFM_ASSERT(0);
00195       ret = 0;
00196       break;
00197   }
00198   return ret;
00199 }

00202 /***************************************************************************/
00210 static void flashWaitStateControl(uint32_t coreFreq)
00211 {
00212   uint32_t mode;
00213   bool mscLocked;
00214 #if defined( MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS0SCBTP )
00215   bool scbtpEn;   /* Suppressed Conditional Branch Target Prefetch setting. */
00216 #endif
00217 
00218   /* Make sure the MSC is unlocked */
00219   mscLocked = MSC->LOCK;
00220   MSC->LOCK = MSC_UNLOCK_CODE;
00221 
00222   /* Get mode and SCBTP enable */
00223   mode = MSC->READCTRL & _MSC_READCTRL_MODE_MASK;
00224 #if defined( MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS0SCBTP )
00225   switch(mode)
00226   {
00227     case MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS0:
00228     case MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS1:
00229 #if defined( MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS2 )
00230     case MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS2:
00231 #endif
00232       scbtpEn = false;
00233       break;
00234 
00235     default: /* WSxSCBTP */
00236       scbtpEn = true;
00237     break;
00238   }
00239 #endif
00240 
00241 
00242   /* Set mode based on the core clock frequency and SCBTP enable */
00243 #if defined( MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS0SCBTP )
00244   if (false)
00245   {
00246   }
00247 #if defined( MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS2 )
00248   else if (coreFreq > CMU_MAX_FREQ_1WS)
00249   {
00250     mode = (scbtpEn ? MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS2SCBTP : MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS2);
00251   }
00252 #endif
00253   else if ((coreFreq <= CMU_MAX_FREQ_1WS) && (coreFreq > CMU_MAX_FREQ_0WS))
00254   {
00255     mode = (scbtpEn ? MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS1SCBTP : MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS1);
00256   }
00257   else
00258   {
00259     mode = (scbtpEn ? MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS0SCBTP : MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS0);
00260   }
00261 
00262 #else /* If MODE and SCBTP is in separate register fields */
00263 
00264   if (false)
00265   {
00266   }
00267 #if defined( MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS2 )
00268   else if (coreFreq > CMU_MAX_FREQ_1WS)
00269   {
00270     mode = MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS2;
00271   }
00272 #endif
00273   else if ((coreFreq <= CMU_MAX_FREQ_1WS) && (coreFreq > CMU_MAX_FREQ_0WS))
00274   {
00275     mode = MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS1;
00276   }
00277   else
00278   {
00279     mode = MSC_READCTRL_MODE_WS0;
00280   }
00281 #endif
00282 
00283   /* BUS_RegMaskedWrite cannot be used here as it would temporarely set the
00284      mode field to WS0 */
00285   MSC->READCTRL = (MSC->READCTRL &~_MSC_READCTRL_MODE_MASK) | mode;
00286 
00287   if (mscLocked)
00288   {
00289     MSC->LOCK = 0;
00290   }
00291 }

00300 static void flashWaitStateMax(void)
00301 {
00302   flashWaitStateControl(SystemMaxCoreClockGet());
00303 }

00306 /***************************************************************************/
00317 static uint32_t lfClkGet(CMU_Clock_TypeDef lfClkBranch)
00318 {
00319   uint32_t sel;
00320   uint32_t ret = 0;
00321 
00322   switch (lfClkBranch)
00323   {
00324     case cmuClock_LFA:
00325     case cmuClock_LFB:
00326 #if defined( _CMU_LFCCLKEN0_MASK )
00327     case cmuClock_LFC:
00328 #endif
00329 #if defined( _CMU_LFECLKSEL_MASK )
00330     case cmuClock_LFE:
00331 #endif
00332       break;
00333 
00334     default:
00335       EFM_ASSERT(0);
00336       break;
00337   }
00338 
00339   sel = CMU_ClockSelectGet(lfClkBranch);
00340 
00341   /* Get clock select field */
00342   switch (lfClkBranch)
00343   {
00344     case cmuClock_LFA:
00345 #if defined( _CMU_LFCLKSEL_MASK )
00346       sel = (CMU->LFCLKSEL & _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_MASK) >> _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_SHIFT;
00347 #elif defined( _CMU_LFACLKSEL_MASK )
00348       sel = (CMU->LFACLKSEL & _CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_MASK) >> _CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_SHIFT;
00349 #else
00350       EFM_ASSERT(0);
00351 #endif
00352       break;
00353 
00354     case cmuClock_LFB:
00355 #if defined( _CMU_LFCLKSEL_MASK )
00356       sel = (CMU->LFCLKSEL & _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFB_MASK) >> _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFB_SHIFT;
00357 #elif defined( _CMU_LFBCLKSEL_MASK )
00358       sel = (CMU->LFBCLKSEL & _CMU_LFBCLKSEL_LFB_MASK) >> _CMU_LFBCLKSEL_LFB_SHIFT;
00359 #else
00360       EFM_ASSERT(0);
00361 #endif
00362       break;
00363 
00364 #if defined( _CMU_LFCCLKEN0_MASK )
00365     case cmuClock_LFC:
00366       sel = (CMU->LFCLKSEL & _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFC_MASK) >> _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFC_SHIFT;
00367       break;
00368 #endif
00369 
00370 #if defined( _CMU_LFECLKSEL_MASK )
00371     case cmuClock_LFE:
00372       sel = (CMU->LFECLKSEL & _CMU_LFECLKSEL_LFE_MASK) >> _CMU_LFECLKSEL_LFE_SHIFT;
00373       break;
00374 #endif
00375 
00376     default:
00377       EFM_ASSERT(0);
00378       break;
00379   }
00380 
00381   /* Get clock frequency */
00382 #if defined( _CMU_LFCLKSEL_MASK )
00383   switch (sel)
00384   {
00385     case _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_LFRCO:
00386       ret = SystemLFRCOClockGet();
00387       break;
00388 
00389     case _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_LFXO:
00390       ret = SystemLFXOClockGet();
00391       break;
00392 
00393 #if defined( _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_HFCORECLKLEDIV2 )
00394     case _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_HFCORECLKLEDIV2:
00395 #if defined( CMU_CTRL_HFLE )
00396       /* Family which can use an extra div 4 divider  */
00397       /* (and must if >32MHz) or HFLE is set.         */
00398       if(((CMU->HFCORECLKDIV & _CMU_HFCORECLKDIV_HFCORECLKLEDIV_MASK)
00399            == CMU_HFCORECLKDIV_HFCORECLKLEDIV_DIV4)
00400          || (CMU->CTRL & CMU_CTRL_HFLE))
00401       {
00402         ret = SystemCoreClockGet() / 4U;
00403       }
00404       else
00405       {
00406         ret = SystemCoreClockGet() / 2U;
00407       }
00408 #else
00409       ret = SystemCoreClockGet() / 2U;
00410 #endif
00411       break;
00412 #endif
00413 
00414     case _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_DISABLED:
00415       ret = 0;
00416 #if defined( CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFAE )
00417       /* Check LF Extended bit setting for LFA or LFB ULFRCO clock */
00418       if ((lfClkBranch == cmuClock_LFA) || (lfClkBranch == cmuClock_LFB))
00419       {
00420         if (CMU->LFCLKSEL >> (lfClkBranch == cmuClock_LFA
00421                               ? _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFAE_SHIFT
00422                               : _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFBE_SHIFT))
00423         {
00424           ret = SystemULFRCOClockGet();
00425         }
00426       }
00427 #endif
00428       break;
00429 
00430     default:
00431       EFM_ASSERT(0);
00432       ret = 0U;
00433       break;
00434   }
00435 #endif /* _CMU_LFCLKSEL_MASK */
00436 
00437 #if defined( _CMU_LFACLKSEL_MASK )
00438   switch (sel)
00439   {
00440     case _CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_LFRCO:
00441       ret = SystemLFRCOClockGet();
00442       break;
00443 
00444     case _CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_LFXO:
00445       ret = SystemLFXOClockGet();
00446       break;
00447 
00448     case _CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_ULFRCO:
00449       ret = SystemULFRCOClockGet();
00450       break;
00451 
00452 #if defined( _CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_HFCLKLE )
00453     case _CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_HFCLKLE:
00454       ret = ((CMU->HFPRESC & _CMU_HFPRESC_HFCLKLEPRESC_MASK)
00455              == CMU_HFPRESC_HFCLKLEPRESC_DIV4)
00456             ? SystemCoreClockGet() / 4U
00457             : SystemCoreClockGet() / 2U;
00458       break;
00459 #elif defined( _CMU_LFBCLKSEL_LFB_HFCLKLE )
00460     case _CMU_LFBCLKSEL_LFB_HFCLKLE:
00461       ret = ((CMU->HFPRESC & _CMU_HFPRESC_HFCLKLEPRESC_MASK)
00462              == CMU_HFPRESC_HFCLKLEPRESC_DIV4)
00463             ? SystemCoreClockGet() / 4U
00464             : SystemCoreClockGet() / 2U;
00465       break;
00466 #endif
00467 
00468     case _CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_DISABLED:
00469       ret = 0;
00470       break;
00471   }
00472 #endif
00473 
00474   return ret;
00475 }
00476 
00477 
00478 #if defined( CMU_CTRL_HFLE )              \
00479     && !defined( _EFM32_WONDER_FAMILY )   \
00480     && !defined( _EZR32_LEOPARD_FAMILY )  \
00481     && !defined( _EZR32_WONDER_FAMILY )
00482 /***************************************************************************/
00486 static uint32_t maxFreqHfle(void)
00487 {
00488   uint16_t majorMinorRev;
00489 
00490   switch (SYSTEM_GetFamily())
00491   {
00492     case systemPartFamilyEfm32Leopard:
00493       /* CHIP MAJOR bit [5:0] */
00494       majorMinorRev = (((ROMTABLE->PID0 & _ROMTABLE_PID0_REVMAJOR_MASK)
00495                         >> _ROMTABLE_PID0_REVMAJOR_SHIFT) << 8);
00496       /* CHIP MINOR bit [7:4] */
00497       majorMinorRev |= (((ROMTABLE->PID2 & _ROMTABLE_PID2_REVMINORMSB_MASK)
00498                          >> _ROMTABLE_PID2_REVMINORMSB_SHIFT) << 4);
00499       /* CHIP MINOR bit [3:0] */
00500       majorMinorRev |=  ((ROMTABLE->PID3 & _ROMTABLE_PID3_REVMINORLSB_MASK)
00501                          >> _ROMTABLE_PID3_REVMINORLSB_SHIFT);
00502 
00503       if (majorMinorRev >= 0x0204)
00504         return 24000000;
00505       else
00506         return 32000000;
00507 
00508     case systemPartFamilyEfm32Giant:
00509       return 32000000;
00510 
00511     default:
00512       /* Invalid device family. */
00513       EFM_ASSERT(false);
00514       return 0;
00515   }
00516 }
00517 #endif

00520 /***************************************************************************/
00528 __STATIC_INLINE void syncReg(uint32_t mask)
00529 {
00530   /* Avoid deadlock if modifying the same register twice when freeze mode is */
00531   /* activated. */
00532   if (CMU->FREEZE & CMU_FREEZE_REGFREEZE)
00533     return;
00534 
00535   /* Wait for any pending previous write operation to have been completed */
00536   /* in low frequency domain */
00537   while (CMU->SYNCBUSY & mask)
00538   {
00539   }
00540 }

00543 #if defined(USB_PRESENT)
00544 /***************************************************************************/
00551 static uint32_t usbCClkGet(void)
00552 {
00553   uint32_t ret;
00554   CMU_Select_TypeDef clk;
00555 
00556   /* Get selected clock source */
00557   clk = CMU_ClockSelectGet(cmuClock_USBC);
00558 
00559   switch(clk)
00560   {
00561     case cmuSelect_LFXO:
00562       ret = SystemLFXOClockGet();
00563       break;
00564     case cmuSelect_LFRCO:
00565       ret = SystemLFRCOClockGet();
00566       break;
00567     case cmuSelect_HFCLK:
00568       ret = SystemHFClockGet();
00569       break;
00570     default:
00571       /* Clock is not enabled */
00572       ret = 0;
00573       break;
00574   }
00575   return ret;
00576 }

00594 CMU_AUXHFRCOBand_TypeDef CMU_AUXHFRCOBandGet(void)
00595 {
00596   return (CMU_AUXHFRCOBand_TypeDef)((CMU->AUXHFRCOCTRL
00597                                      & _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_BAND_MASK)
00598                                     >> _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_BAND_SHIFT);
00599 }

00602 
00603 #if defined( _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_BAND_MASK )
00604 /***************************************************************************/
00612 void CMU_AUXHFRCOBandSet(CMU_AUXHFRCOBand_TypeDef band)
00613 {
00614   uint32_t tuning;
00615 
00616   /* Read tuning value from calibration table */
00617   switch (band)
00618   {
00619     case cmuAUXHFRCOBand_1MHz:
00620       tuning = (DEVINFO->AUXHFRCOCAL0 & _DEVINFO_AUXHFRCOCAL0_BAND1_MASK)
00621                >> _DEVINFO_AUXHFRCOCAL0_BAND1_SHIFT;
00622       break;
00623 
00624     case cmuAUXHFRCOBand_7MHz:
00625       tuning = (DEVINFO->AUXHFRCOCAL0 & _DEVINFO_AUXHFRCOCAL0_BAND7_MASK)
00626                >> _DEVINFO_AUXHFRCOCAL0_BAND7_SHIFT;
00627       break;
00628 
00629     case cmuAUXHFRCOBand_11MHz:
00630       tuning = (DEVINFO->AUXHFRCOCAL0 & _DEVINFO_AUXHFRCOCAL0_BAND11_MASK)
00631                >> _DEVINFO_AUXHFRCOCAL0_BAND11_SHIFT;
00632       break;
00633 
00634     case cmuAUXHFRCOBand_14MHz:
00635       tuning = (DEVINFO->AUXHFRCOCAL0 & _DEVINFO_AUXHFRCOCAL0_BAND14_MASK)
00636                >> _DEVINFO_AUXHFRCOCAL0_BAND14_SHIFT;
00637       break;
00638 
00639     case cmuAUXHFRCOBand_21MHz:
00640       tuning = (DEVINFO->AUXHFRCOCAL1 & _DEVINFO_AUXHFRCOCAL1_BAND21_MASK)
00641                >> _DEVINFO_AUXHFRCOCAL1_BAND21_SHIFT;
00642       break;
00643 
00644 #if defined( _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_BAND_28MHZ )
00645     case cmuAUXHFRCOBand_28MHz:
00646       tuning = (DEVINFO->AUXHFRCOCAL1 & _DEVINFO_AUXHFRCOCAL1_BAND28_MASK)
00647                >> _DEVINFO_AUXHFRCOCAL1_BAND28_SHIFT;
00648       break;
00649 #endif
00650 
00651     default:
00652       EFM_ASSERT(0);
00653       return;
00654   }
00655 
00656   /* Set band/tuning */
00657   CMU->AUXHFRCOCTRL = (CMU->AUXHFRCOCTRL &
00658                        ~(_CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_BAND_MASK
00659                          | _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_TUNING_MASK))
00660                       | (band << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_BAND_SHIFT)
00661                       | (tuning << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_TUNING_SHIFT);
00662 
00663 }
00664 #endif /* _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_BAND_MASK */
00665 
00666 
00667 #if defined( _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_FREQRANGE_MASK )
00668 /**************************************************************************/
00678 uint32_t* CMU_AUXHFRCODevinfoGet(CMU_AUXHFRCOFreq_TypeDef freq)
00679 {
00680   switch (freq)
00681   {
00682   /* 1, 2 and 4MHz share the same calibration word */
00683     case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_1M0Hz:
00684     case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_2M0Hz:
00685     case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_4M0Hz:
00686       return (uint32_t *)(&DEVINFO->AUXHFRCOCAL0 + 0);
00687 
00688     case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_7M0Hz:
00689       return (uint32_t *)(&DEVINFO->AUXHFRCOCAL0 + 3);
00690 
00691     case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_13M0Hz:
00692       return (uint32_t *)(&DEVINFO->AUXHFRCOCAL0 + 6);
00693 
00694     case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_16M0Hz:
00695       return (uint32_t *)(&DEVINFO->AUXHFRCOCAL0 + 7);
00696 
00697     case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_19M0Hz:
00698       return (uint32_t *)(&DEVINFO->AUXHFRCOCAL0 + 8);
00699 
00700     case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_26M0Hz:
00701       return (uint32_t *)(&DEVINFO->AUXHFRCOCAL0 + 10);
00702 
00703     case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_32M0Hz:
00704       return (uint32_t *)(&DEVINFO->AUXHFRCOCAL0 + 11);
00705 
00706     case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_38M0Hz:
00707       return (uint32_t *)(&DEVINFO->AUXHFRCOCAL0 + 12);
00708 
00709     default: /* cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_UserDefined */
00710       return NULL;
00711   }
00712 }
00713 #endif /* _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_FREQRANGE_MASK */
00714

00726   return auxHfrcoFreq;

00730 
00731 #if defined( _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_FREQRANGE_MASK )
00732 /***************************************************************************/
00739 void CMU_AUXHFRCOFreqSet(CMU_AUXHFRCOFreq_TypeDef freq)
00740 {
00741   uint32_t *freqCalDevinfo;
00742   uint32_t freqCal;
00743   uint32_t ctrlReg;
00744 
00745   /* Get DEVINFO index, set frequency */
00746   freqCalDevinfo = CMU_AUXHFRCODevinfoGet(freq);
00747   EFM_ASSERT(freqCalDevinfo != NULL);
00748   freqCal = * freqCalDevinfo;
00749   auxHfrcoFreq = freq;
00750 
00751   /* If calibration is present in DEVINFO, set calibration data for the selected
00752      frequency. Wait for any previous sync to complete first. */
00753   while(BUS_RegBitRead(&CMU->SYNCBUSY, _CMU_SYNCBUSY_AUXHFRCOBSY_SHIFT))
00754   {
00755   }
00756   if (freqCal != ~0U)
00757   {
00758     /* Set divider in AUXHFRCOCTRL for 1 and 2MHz */
00759     switch(freq)
00760     {
00761       case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_1M0Hz:
00762         freqCal = (freqCal & ~_CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_CLKDIV_MASK)
00763                   | (2 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_CLKDIV_SHIFT);
00764         break;
00765 
00766       case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_2M0Hz:
00767         freqCal = (freqCal & ~_CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_CLKDIV_MASK)
00768                   | (1 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_CLKDIV_SHIFT);
00769         break;
00770 
00771       default:
00772         break;
00773     }
00774     CMU->AUXHFRCOCTRL = freqCal;
00775   }
00776   else
00777   {
00778     /* Calibration data does not exist, set best known approximation. */
00779     ctrlReg = _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_RESETVALUE
00780               & ~(_CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_FREQRANGE_MASK
00781                   | _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_LDOHP_MASK
00782                   | _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_CLKDIV_MASK);
00783 
00784     switch(freq)
00785     {
00786       case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_1M0Hz:
00787         ctrlReg |= (0 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_FREQRANGE_SHIFT)
00788                    | (0 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_LDOHP_SHIFT)
00789                    | (2 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_CLKDIV_SHIFT);
00790         break;
00791 
00792       case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_2M0Hz:
00793         ctrlReg |= (0 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_FREQRANGE_SHIFT)
00794                    | (0 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_LDOHP_SHIFT)
00795                    | (1 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_CLKDIV_SHIFT);
00796         break;
00797 
00798       case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_4M0Hz:
00799         ctrlReg |= (0 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_FREQRANGE_SHIFT)
00800                    | (0 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_LDOHP_SHIFT)
00801                    | (0 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_CLKDIV_SHIFT);
00802         break;
00803 
00804       case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_7M0Hz:
00805         ctrlReg |= (3 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_FREQRANGE_SHIFT)
00806                    | (1 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_LDOHP_SHIFT)
00807                    | (0 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_CLKDIV_SHIFT);
00808         break;
00809 
00810       case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_13M0Hz:
00811         ctrlReg |= (6 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_FREQRANGE_SHIFT)
00812                    | (1 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_LDOHP_SHIFT)
00813                    | (0 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_CLKDIV_SHIFT);
00814         break;
00815 
00816       case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_16M0Hz:
00817         ctrlReg |= (7 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_FREQRANGE_SHIFT)
00818                    | (1 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_LDOHP_SHIFT)
00819                    | (0 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_CLKDIV_SHIFT);
00820         break;
00821 
00822       case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_19M0Hz:
00823         ctrlReg |= (8 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_FREQRANGE_SHIFT)
00824                    | (1 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_LDOHP_SHIFT)
00825                    | (0 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_CLKDIV_SHIFT);
00826         break;
00827 
00828       case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_26M0Hz:
00829         ctrlReg |= (10 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_FREQRANGE_SHIFT)
00830                    | (1 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_LDOHP_SHIFT)
00831                    | (0 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_CLKDIV_SHIFT);
00832         break;
00833 
00834       case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_32M0Hz:
00835         ctrlReg |= (11 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_FREQRANGE_SHIFT)
00836                    | (1 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_LDOHP_SHIFT)
00837                    | (0 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_CLKDIV_SHIFT);
00838         break;
00839 
00840       case cmuAUXHFRCOFreq_38M0Hz:
00841         ctrlReg |= (12 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_FREQRANGE_SHIFT)
00842                    | (1 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_LDOHP_SHIFT)
00843                    | (0 << _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_CLKDIV_SHIFT);
00844         break;
00845 
00846       default:
00847         EFM_ASSERT(0);
00848         break;
00849     }
00850     CMU->AUXHFRCOCTRL = ctrlReg;
00851   }
00852 }
00853 #endif /* _CMU_AUXHFRCOCTRL_FREQRANGE_MASK */
00854 
00855 
00856 /***************************************************************************/
00878 uint32_t CMU_Calibrate(uint32_t HFCycles, CMU_Osc_TypeDef ref)
00879 {
00880   EFM_ASSERT(HFCycles <= (_CMU_CALCNT_CALCNT_MASK >> _CMU_CALCNT_CALCNT_SHIFT));
00881 
00882   /* Set reference clock source */
00883   switch (ref)
00884   {
00885     case cmuOsc_LFXO:
00886       CMU->CALCTRL = CMU_CALCTRL_UPSEL_LFXO;
00887       break;
00888 
00889     case cmuOsc_LFRCO:
00890       CMU->CALCTRL = CMU_CALCTRL_UPSEL_LFRCO;
00891       break;
00892 
00893     case cmuOsc_HFXO:
00894       CMU->CALCTRL = CMU_CALCTRL_UPSEL_HFXO;
00895       break;
00896 
00897     case cmuOsc_HFRCO:
00898       CMU->CALCTRL = CMU_CALCTRL_UPSEL_HFRCO;
00899       break;
00900 
00901     case cmuOsc_AUXHFRCO:
00902       CMU->CALCTRL = CMU_CALCTRL_UPSEL_AUXHFRCO;
00903       break;
00904 
00905     default:
00906       EFM_ASSERT(0);
00907       return 0;
00908   }
00909 
00910   /* Set top value */
00911   CMU->CALCNT = HFCycles;
00912 
00913   /* Start calibration */
00914   CMU->CMD = CMU_CMD_CALSTART;
00915 
00916 #if defined( CMU_STATUS_CALRDY )
00917   /* Wait until calibration completes */
00918   while (!BUS_RegBitRead(&CMU->STATUS, _CMU_STATUS_CALRDY_SHIFT))
00919   {
00920   }
00921 #else
00922   /* Wait until calibration completes */
00923   while (BUS_RegBitRead(&CMU->STATUS, _CMU_STATUS_CALBSY_SHIFT))
00924   {
00925   }
00926 #endif
00927 
00928   return CMU->CALCNT;
00929 }
00930 
00931 
00932 #if defined( _CMU_CALCTRL_UPSEL_MASK ) && defined( _CMU_CALCTRL_DOWNSEL_MASK )
00933 /***************************************************************************/
00959 void CMU_CalibrateConfig(uint32_t downCycles, CMU_Osc_TypeDef downSel,
00960                          CMU_Osc_TypeDef upSel)
00961 {
00962   /* Keep untouched configuration settings */
00963   uint32_t calCtrl = CMU->CALCTRL
00964                      & ~(_CMU_CALCTRL_UPSEL_MASK | _CMU_CALCTRL_DOWNSEL_MASK);
00965 
00966   /* 20 bits of precision to calibration count register */
00967   EFM_ASSERT(downCycles <= (_CMU_CALCNT_CALCNT_MASK >> _CMU_CALCNT_CALCNT_SHIFT));
00968 
00969   /* Set down counting clock source - down counter */
00970   switch (downSel)
00971   {
00972     case cmuOsc_LFXO:
00973       calCtrl |= CMU_CALCTRL_DOWNSEL_LFXO;
00974       break;
00975 
00976     case cmuOsc_LFRCO:
00977       calCtrl |= CMU_CALCTRL_DOWNSEL_LFRCO;
00978       break;
00979 
00980     case cmuOsc_HFXO:
00981       calCtrl |= CMU_CALCTRL_DOWNSEL_HFXO;
00982       break;
00983 
00984     case cmuOsc_HFRCO:
00985       calCtrl |= CMU_CALCTRL_DOWNSEL_HFRCO;
00986       break;
00987 
00988     case cmuOsc_AUXHFRCO:
00989       calCtrl |= CMU_CALCTRL_DOWNSEL_AUXHFRCO;
00990       break;
00991 
00992     default:
00993       EFM_ASSERT(0);
00994       break;
00995   }
00996 
00997   /* Set top value to be counted down by the downSel clock */
00998   CMU->CALCNT = downCycles;
00999 
01000   /* Set reference clock source - up counter */
01001   switch (upSel)
01002   {
01003     case cmuOsc_LFXO:
01004       calCtrl |= CMU_CALCTRL_UPSEL_LFXO;
01005       break;
01006 
01007     case cmuOsc_LFRCO:
01008       calCtrl |= CMU_CALCTRL_UPSEL_LFRCO;
01009       break;
01010 
01011     case cmuOsc_HFXO:
01012       calCtrl |= CMU_CALCTRL_UPSEL_HFXO;
01013       break;
01014 
01015     case cmuOsc_HFRCO:
01016       calCtrl |= CMU_CALCTRL_UPSEL_HFRCO;
01017       break;
01018 
01019     case cmuOsc_AUXHFRCO:
01020       calCtrl |= CMU_CALCTRL_UPSEL_AUXHFRCO;
01021       break;
01022 
01023     default:
01024       EFM_ASSERT(0);
01025       break;
01026   }
01027 
01028   CMU->CALCTRL = calCtrl;
01029 }
01030 #endif
01031 
01032 
01033 /***************************************************************************/
01046 uint32_t CMU_CalibrateCountGet(void)
01047 {
01048   /* Wait until calibration completes, UNLESS continuous calibration mode is  */
01049   /* active */
01050 #if defined( CMU_CALCTRL_CONT )
01051   if (!BUS_RegBitRead(&CMU->CALCTRL, _CMU_CALCTRL_CONT_SHIFT))
01052   {
01053 #if defined( CMU_STATUS_CALRDY )
01054     /* Wait until calibration completes */
01055     while (!BUS_RegBitRead(&CMU->STATUS, _CMU_STATUS_CALRDY_SHIFT))
01056     {
01057     }
01058 #else
01059     /* Wait until calibration completes */
01060     while (BUS_RegBitRead(&CMU->STATUS, _CMU_STATUS_CALBSY_SHIFT))
01061     {
01062     }
01063 #endif
01064   }
01065 #else
01066   while (BUS_RegBitRead(&CMU->STATUS, _CMU_STATUS_CALBSY_SHIFT))
01067   {
01068   }
01069 #endif
01070   return CMU->CALCNT;
01071 }
01072 
01073 
01074 /***************************************************************************/
01086 CMU_ClkDiv_TypeDef CMU_ClockDivGet(CMU_Clock_TypeDef clock)
01087 {
01088 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
01089   return 1 + (uint32_t)CMU_ClockPrescGet(clock);
01090 
01091 #elif defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_1 )
01092   uint32_t           divReg;
01093   CMU_ClkDiv_TypeDef ret;
01094 
01095   /* Get divisor reg id */
01096   divReg = (clock >> CMU_DIV_REG_POS) & CMU_DIV_REG_MASK;
01097 
01098   switch (divReg)
01099   {
01100 #if defined( _CMU_CTRL_HFCLKDIV_MASK )
01101     case CMU_HFCLKDIV_REG:
01102       ret = 1 + ((CMU->CTRL & _CMU_CTRL_HFCLKDIV_MASK)
01103                  >> _CMU_CTRL_HFCLKDIV_SHIFT);
01104       break;
01105 #endif
01106 
01107     case CMU_HFPERCLKDIV_REG:
01108       ret = (CMU_ClkDiv_TypeDef)((CMU->HFPERCLKDIV
01109                                   & _CMU_HFPERCLKDIV_HFPERCLKDIV_MASK)
01110                                  >> _CMU_HFPERCLKDIV_HFPERCLKDIV_SHIFT);
01111       ret = CMU_Log2ToDiv(ret);
01112       break;
01113 
01114     case CMU_HFCORECLKDIV_REG:
01115       ret = (CMU_ClkDiv_TypeDef)((CMU->HFCORECLKDIV
01116                                   & _CMU_HFCORECLKDIV_HFCORECLKDIV_MASK)
01117                                  >> _CMU_HFCORECLKDIV_HFCORECLKDIV_SHIFT);
01118       ret = CMU_Log2ToDiv(ret);
01119       break;
01120 
01121     case CMU_LFAPRESC0_REG:
01122       switch (clock)
01123       {
01124         case cmuClock_RTC:
01125           ret = (CMU_ClkDiv_TypeDef)((CMU->LFAPRESC0 & _CMU_LFAPRESC0_RTC_MASK)
01126                                      >> _CMU_LFAPRESC0_RTC_SHIFT);
01127           ret = CMU_Log2ToDiv(ret);
01128           break;
01129 
01130 #if defined(_CMU_LFAPRESC0_LETIMER0_MASK)
01131         case cmuClock_LETIMER0:
01132           ret = (CMU_ClkDiv_TypeDef)((CMU->LFAPRESC0 & _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LETIMER0_MASK)
01133                                      >> _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LETIMER0_SHIFT);
01134           ret = CMU_Log2ToDiv(ret);
01135           break;
01136 #endif
01137 
01138 #if defined(_CMU_LFAPRESC0_LCD_MASK)
01139         case cmuClock_LCDpre:
01140           ret = (CMU_ClkDiv_TypeDef)(((CMU->LFAPRESC0 & _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LCD_MASK)
01141                                       >> _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LCD_SHIFT)
01142                                      + CMU_DivToLog2(cmuClkDiv_16));
01143           ret = CMU_Log2ToDiv(ret);
01144           break;
01145 #endif
01146 
01147 #if defined(_CMU_LFAPRESC0_LESENSE_MASK)
01148         case cmuClock_LESENSE:
01149           ret = (CMU_ClkDiv_TypeDef)((CMU->LFAPRESC0 & _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LESENSE_MASK)
01150                                      >> _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LESENSE_SHIFT);
01151           ret = CMU_Log2ToDiv(ret);
01152           break;
01153 #endif
01154 
01155         default:
01156           EFM_ASSERT(0);
01157           ret = cmuClkDiv_1;
01158           break;
01159       }
01160       break;
01161 
01162     case CMU_LFBPRESC0_REG:
01163       switch (clock)
01164       {
01165 #if defined(_CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART0_MASK)
01166         case cmuClock_LEUART0:
01167           ret = (CMU_ClkDiv_TypeDef)((CMU->LFBPRESC0 & _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART0_MASK)
01168                                      >> _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART0_SHIFT);
01169           ret = CMU_Log2ToDiv(ret);
01170           break;
01171 #endif
01172 
01173 #if defined(_CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART1_MASK)
01174         case cmuClock_LEUART1:
01175           ret = (CMU_ClkDiv_TypeDef)((CMU->LFBPRESC0 & _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART1_MASK)
01176                                      >> _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART1_SHIFT);
01177           ret = CMU_Log2ToDiv(ret);
01178           break;
01179 #endif
01180 
01181         default:
01182           EFM_ASSERT(0);
01183           ret = cmuClkDiv_1;
01184           break;
01185       }
01186       break;
01187 
01188     default:
01189       EFM_ASSERT(0);
01190       ret = cmuClkDiv_1;
01191       break;
01192   }
01193 
01194   return ret;
01195 #endif
01196 }
01197 
01198 
01199 /***************************************************************************/
01218 void CMU_ClockDivSet(CMU_Clock_TypeDef clock, CMU_ClkDiv_TypeDef div)
01219 {
01220 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
01221   CMU_ClockPrescSet(clock, (CMU_ClkPresc_TypeDef)(div - 1));
01222 
01223 #elif defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_1 )
01224   uint32_t freq;
01225   uint32_t divReg;
01226 
01227   /* Get divisor reg id */
01228   divReg = (clock >> CMU_DIV_REG_POS) & CMU_DIV_REG_MASK;
01229 
01230   switch (divReg)
01231   {
01232 #if defined( _CMU_CTRL_HFCLKDIV_MASK )
01233     case CMU_HFCLKDIV_REG:
01234       EFM_ASSERT((div>=cmuClkDiv_1) && (div<=cmuClkDiv_8));
01235 
01236       /* Configure worst case wait states for flash access before setting divisor */
01237       flashWaitStateMax();
01238 
01239       /* Set divider */
01240       CMU->CTRL = (CMU->CTRL & ~_CMU_CTRL_HFCLKDIV_MASK)
01241                   | ((div-1) << _CMU_CTRL_HFCLKDIV_SHIFT);
01242 
01243       /* Update CMSIS core clock variable */
01244       /* (The function will update the global variable) */
01245       freq = SystemCoreClockGet();
01246 
01247       /* Optimize flash access wait state setting for current core clk */
01248       flashWaitStateControl(freq);
01249       break;
01250 #endif
01251 
01252     case CMU_HFPERCLKDIV_REG:
01253       EFM_ASSERT((div >= cmuClkDiv_1) && (div <= cmuClkDiv_512));
01254       /* Convert to correct scale */
01255       div = CMU_DivToLog2(div);
01256       CMU->HFPERCLKDIV = (CMU->HFPERCLKDIV & ~_CMU_HFPERCLKDIV_HFPERCLKDIV_MASK)
01257                          | (div << _CMU_HFPERCLKDIV_HFPERCLKDIV_SHIFT);
01258       break;
01259 
01260     case CMU_HFCORECLKDIV_REG:
01261       EFM_ASSERT(div <= cmuClkDiv_512);
01262 
01263       /* Configure worst case wait states for flash access before setting divisor */
01264       flashWaitStateMax();
01265 
01266 #if defined( CMU_CTRL_HFLE )
01267       /* Clear HFLE and set DIV2 factor for peripheral clock
01268          when running at frequencies lower than or equal to CMU_MAX_FREQ_HFLE. */
01269       if ((CMU_ClockFreqGet(cmuClock_HF) / div) <= CMU_MAX_FREQ_HFLE())
01270       {
01271         /* Clear CMU HFLE */
01272         BUS_RegBitWrite(&CMU->CTRL, _CMU_CTRL_HFLE_SHIFT, 0);
01273 
01274         /* Set DIV2 factor for peripheral clock */
01275         BUS_RegBitWrite(&CMU->HFCORECLKDIV,
01276                         _CMU_HFCORECLKDIV_HFCORECLKLEDIV_SHIFT, 0);
01277       }
01278       else
01279       {
01280         /* Set CMU HFLE */
01281         BUS_RegBitWrite(&CMU->CTRL, _CMU_CTRL_HFLE_SHIFT, 1);
01282 
01283         /* Set DIV4 factor for peripheral clock */
01284         BUS_RegBitWrite(&CMU->HFCORECLKDIV,
01285                         _CMU_HFCORECLKDIV_HFCORECLKLEDIV_SHIFT, 1);
01286       }
01287 #endif
01288 
01289       /* Convert to correct scale */
01290       div = CMU_DivToLog2(div);
01291 
01292       CMU->HFCORECLKDIV = (CMU->HFCORECLKDIV
01293                            & ~_CMU_HFCORECLKDIV_HFCORECLKDIV_MASK)
01294                           | (div << _CMU_HFCORECLKDIV_HFCORECLKDIV_SHIFT);
01295 
01296       /* Update CMSIS core clock variable */
01297       /* (The function will update the global variable) */
01298       freq = SystemCoreClockGet();
01299 
01300       /* Optimize flash access wait state setting for current core clk */
01301       flashWaitStateControl(freq);
01302       break;
01303 
01304     case CMU_LFAPRESC0_REG:
01305       switch (clock)
01306       {
01307         case cmuClock_RTC:
01308           EFM_ASSERT(div <= cmuClkDiv_32768);
01309 
01310           /* LF register about to be modified require sync. busy check */
01311           syncReg(CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFAPRESC0);
01312 
01313           /* Convert to correct scale */
01314           div = CMU_DivToLog2(div);
01315 
01316           CMU->LFAPRESC0 = (CMU->LFAPRESC0 & ~_CMU_LFAPRESC0_RTC_MASK)
01317                            | (div << _CMU_LFAPRESC0_RTC_SHIFT);
01318           break;
01319 
01320 #if defined(_CMU_LFAPRESC0_LETIMER0_MASK)
01321         case cmuClock_LETIMER0:
01322           EFM_ASSERT(div <= cmuClkDiv_32768);
01323 
01324           /* LF register about to be modified require sync. busy check */
01325           syncReg(CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFAPRESC0);
01326 
01327           /* Convert to correct scale */
01328           div = CMU_DivToLog2(div);
01329 
01330           CMU->LFAPRESC0 = (CMU->LFAPRESC0 & ~_CMU_LFAPRESC0_LETIMER0_MASK)
01331                            | (div << _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LETIMER0_SHIFT);
01332           break;
01333 #endif
01334 
01335 #if defined(LCD_PRESENT)
01336         case cmuClock_LCDpre:
01337           EFM_ASSERT((div >= cmuClkDiv_16) && (div <= cmuClkDiv_128));
01338 
01339           /* LF register about to be modified require sync. busy check */
01340           syncReg(CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFAPRESC0);
01341 
01342           /* Convert to correct scale */
01343           div = CMU_DivToLog2(div);
01344 
01345           CMU->LFAPRESC0 = (CMU->LFAPRESC0 & ~_CMU_LFAPRESC0_LCD_MASK)
01346                            | ((div - CMU_DivToLog2(cmuClkDiv_16))
01347                               << _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LCD_SHIFT);
01348           break;
01349 #endif /* defined(LCD_PRESENT) */
01350 
01351 #if defined(LESENSE_PRESENT)
01352         case cmuClock_LESENSE:
01353           EFM_ASSERT(div <= cmuClkDiv_8);
01354 
01355           /* LF register about to be modified require sync. busy check */
01356           syncReg(CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFAPRESC0);
01357 
01358           /* Convert to correct scale */
01359           div = CMU_DivToLog2(div);
01360 
01361           CMU->LFAPRESC0 = (CMU->LFAPRESC0 & ~_CMU_LFAPRESC0_LESENSE_MASK)
01362                            | (div << _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LESENSE_SHIFT);
01363           break;
01364 #endif /* defined(LESENSE_PRESENT) */
01365 
01366         default:
01367           EFM_ASSERT(0);
01368           break;
01369       }
01370       break;
01371 
01372     case CMU_LFBPRESC0_REG:
01373       switch (clock)
01374       {
01375 #if defined(_CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART0_MASK)
01376         case cmuClock_LEUART0:
01377           EFM_ASSERT(div <= cmuClkDiv_8);
01378 
01379           /* LF register about to be modified require sync. busy check */
01380           syncReg(CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFBPRESC0);
01381 
01382           /* Convert to correct scale */
01383           div = CMU_DivToLog2(div);
01384 
01385           CMU->LFBPRESC0 = (CMU->LFBPRESC0 & ~_CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART0_MASK)
01386                            | (((uint32_t)div) << _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART0_SHIFT);
01387           break;
01388 #endif
01389 
01390 #if defined(_CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART1_MASK)
01391         case cmuClock_LEUART1:
01392           EFM_ASSERT(div <= cmuClkDiv_8);
01393 
01394           /* LF register about to be modified require sync. busy check */
01395           syncReg(CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFBPRESC0);
01396 
01397           /* Convert to correct scale */
01398           div = CMU_DivToLog2(div);
01399 
01400           CMU->LFBPRESC0 = (CMU->LFBPRESC0 & ~_CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART1_MASK)
01401                            | (((uint32_t)div) << _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART1_SHIFT);
01402           break;
01403 #endif
01404 
01405         default:
01406           EFM_ASSERT(0);
01407           break;
01408       }
01409       break;
01410 
01411     default:
01412       EFM_ASSERT(0);
01413       break;
01414   }
01415 #endif
01416 }
01417 
01418 
01419 /***************************************************************************/
01446 void CMU_ClockEnable(CMU_Clock_TypeDef clock, bool enable)
01447 {
01448   volatile uint32_t *reg;
01449   uint32_t          bit;
01450   uint32_t          sync = 0;
01451 
01452   /* Identify enable register */
01453   switch ((clock >> CMU_EN_REG_POS) & CMU_EN_REG_MASK)
01454   {
01455 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
01456     case CMU_CTRL_EN_REG:
01457       reg = &CMU->CTRL;
01458       break;
01459 #endif
01460 
01461 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_1 )
01462     case CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_EN_REG:
01463       reg = &CMU->HFCORECLKEN0;
01464 #if defined( CMU_CTRL_HFLE )
01465       /* Set HFLE and DIV4 factor for peripheral clock when
01466          running at frequencies higher than or equal to CMU_MAX_FREQ_HFLE. */
01467       if ( CMU_ClockFreqGet(cmuClock_CORE) > CMU_MAX_FREQ_HFLE())
01468       {
01469         /* Enable CMU HFLE */
01470         BUS_RegBitWrite(&CMU->CTRL, _CMU_CTRL_HFLE_SHIFT, 1);
01471 
01472         /* Set DIV4 factor for peripheral clock */
01473         BUS_RegBitWrite(&CMU->HFCORECLKDIV,
01474                         _CMU_HFCORECLKDIV_HFCORECLKLEDIV_SHIFT, 1);
01475       }
01476 #endif
01477       break;
01478 #endif
01479 
01480 #if defined( _CMU_HFBUSCLKEN0_MASK )
01481     case CMU_HFBUSCLKEN0_EN_REG:
01482       reg = &CMU->HFBUSCLKEN0;
01483       break;
01484 #endif
01485 
01486 #if defined( _CMU_HFRADIOCLKEN0_MASK )
01487     case CMU_HFRADIOCLKEN0_EN_REG:
01488       reg = &CMU->HFRADIOCLKEN0;
01489       break;
01490 #endif
01491 
01492 #if defined( _CMU_HFPERCLKDIV_MASK )
01493     case CMU_HFPERCLKDIV_EN_REG:
01494       reg = &CMU->HFPERCLKDIV;
01495       break;
01496 #endif
01497 
01498     case CMU_HFPERCLKEN0_EN_REG:
01499       reg = &CMU->HFPERCLKEN0;
01500       break;
01501 
01502     case CMU_LFACLKEN0_EN_REG:
01503       reg  = &CMU->LFACLKEN0;
01504       sync = CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFACLKEN0;
01505       break;
01506 
01507     case CMU_LFBCLKEN0_EN_REG:
01508       reg  = &CMU->LFBCLKEN0;
01509       sync = CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFBCLKEN0;
01510       break;
01511 
01512 #if defined( _CMU_LFCCLKEN0_MASK )
01513     case CMU_LFCCLKEN0_EN_REG:
01514       reg = &CMU->LFCCLKEN0;
01515       sync = CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFCCLKEN0;
01516       break;
01517 #endif
01518 
01519 #if defined( _CMU_LFECLKEN0_MASK )
01520     case CMU_LFECLKEN0_EN_REG:
01521       reg  = &CMU->LFECLKEN0;
01522       sync = CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFECLKEN0;
01523       break;
01524 #endif
01525 
01526     case CMU_PCNT_EN_REG:
01527       reg = &CMU->PCNTCTRL;
01528       break;
01529 
01530     default: /* Cannot enable/disable clock point */
01531       EFM_ASSERT(0);
01532       return;
01533   }
01534 
01535   /* Get bit position used to enable/disable */
01536   bit = (clock >> CMU_EN_BIT_POS) & CMU_EN_BIT_MASK;
01537 
01538   /* LF synchronization required? */
01539   if (sync)
01540   {
01541     syncReg(sync);
01542   }
01543 
01544   /* Set/clear bit as requested */
01545   BUS_RegBitWrite(reg, bit, enable);
01546 }
01547 
01548 
01549 /***************************************************************************/
01559 uint32_t CMU_ClockFreqGet(CMU_Clock_TypeDef clock)
01560 {
01561   uint32_t ret;
01562 
01563   switch(clock & (CMU_CLK_BRANCH_MASK << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS))
01564   {
01565     case (CMU_HF_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01566       ret = SystemHFClockGet();
01567 #if defined( _CMU_CTRL_HFCLKDIV_MASK )
01568       /* Family with an additional divider. */
01569       ret = ret / (1U + ((CMU->CTRL & _CMU_CTRL_HFCLKDIV_MASK)
01570                          >> _CMU_CTRL_HFCLKDIV_SHIFT));
01571 #endif
01572 #if defined( _CMU_HFPRESC_MASK )
01573       ret = ret / (1U + ((CMU->HFPRESC & _CMU_HFPRESC_PRESC_MASK)
01574                          >> _CMU_HFPRESC_PRESC_SHIFT));
01575 #endif
01576       break;
01577 
01578     case (CMU_HFPER_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01579       ret = SystemHFClockGet();
01580 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_1 )
01581 #if defined( _CMU_CTRL_HFCLKDIV_MASK )
01582       /* Family with an additional divider. */
01583       ret = ret / (1U + ((CMU->CTRL & _CMU_CTRL_HFCLKDIV_MASK)
01584                          >> _CMU_CTRL_HFCLKDIV_SHIFT));
01585 #endif
01586       ret >>= (CMU->HFPERCLKDIV & _CMU_HFPERCLKDIV_HFPERCLKDIV_MASK)
01587               >> _CMU_HFPERCLKDIV_HFPERCLKDIV_SHIFT;
01588 #elif defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
01589       ret /= 1U + ((CMU->HFPERPRESC & _CMU_HFPERPRESC_PRESC_MASK)
01590                    >> _CMU_HFPERPRESC_PRESC_SHIFT);
01591 #endif
01592       break;
01593 
01594 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
01595 #if defined( _CMU_HFRADIOPRESC_PRESC_MASK )
01596     case (CMU_HFRADIO_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01597       ret = SystemHFClockGet();
01598       ret /= 1U + ((CMU->HFRADIOPRESC & _CMU_HFRADIOPRESC_PRESC_MASK)
01599                    >> _CMU_HFRADIOPRESC_PRESC_SHIFT);
01600       break;
01601 #endif
01602 
01603 #if defined( CRYPTO_PRESENT )   \
01604     || defined( LDMA_PRESENT )  \
01605     || defined( GPCRC_PRESENT ) \
01606     || defined( PRS_PRESENT )   \
01607     || defined( GPIO_PRESENT )
01608     case (CMU_HFBUS_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01609       ret = SystemHFClockGet();
01610       break;
01611 #endif
01612 
01613     case (CMU_HFCORE_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01614       ret = SystemHFClockGet();
01615       ret /= 1U + ((CMU->HFCOREPRESC & _CMU_HFCOREPRESC_PRESC_MASK)
01616                    >> _CMU_HFCOREPRESC_PRESC_SHIFT);
01617       break;
01618 
01619     case (CMU_HFEXP_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01620       ret = SystemHFClockGet();
01621       ret /= 1U + ((CMU->HFEXPPRESC & _CMU_HFEXPPRESC_PRESC_MASK)
01622                    >> _CMU_HFEXPPRESC_PRESC_SHIFT);
01623       break;
01624 #endif
01625 
01626 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_1 )
01627 #if defined(AES_PRESENT)    \
01628     || defined(DMA_PRESENT) \
01629     || defined(EBI_PRESENT) \
01630     || defined(USB_PRESENT)
01631     case (CMU_HFCORE_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01632     {
01633       ret = SystemCoreClockGet();
01634     } break;
01635 #endif
01636 #endif
01637 
01638     case (CMU_LFA_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01639       ret = lfClkGet(cmuClock_LFA);
01640       break;
01641 
01642 #if defined( _CMU_LFACLKEN0_RTC_MASK )
01643     case (CMU_RTC_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01644       ret = lfClkGet(cmuClock_LFA);
01645       ret >>= (CMU->LFAPRESC0 & _CMU_LFAPRESC0_RTC_MASK)
01646               >> _CMU_LFAPRESC0_RTC_SHIFT;
01647       break;
01648 #endif
01649 
01650 #if defined( _CMU_LFECLKEN0_RTCC_MASK )
01651     case (CMU_RTCC_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01652       ret = lfClkGet(cmuClock_LFE);
01653       break;
01654 #endif
01655 
01656 #if defined( _CMU_LFACLKEN0_LETIMER0_MASK )
01657     case (CMU_LETIMER0_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01658       ret = lfClkGet(cmuClock_LFA);
01659 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_1 )
01660       ret >>= (CMU->LFAPRESC0 & _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LETIMER0_MASK)
01661               >> _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LETIMER0_SHIFT;
01662 #elif defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
01663       ret /= CMU_Log2ToDiv((CMU->LFAPRESC0 & _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LETIMER0_MASK)
01664                            >> _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LETIMER0_SHIFT);
01665 #endif
01666       break;
01667 #endif
01668 
01669 #if defined(_CMU_LFACLKEN0_LCD_MASK)
01670     case (CMU_LCDPRE_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01671       ret = lfClkGet(cmuClock_LFA);
01672       ret >>= ((CMU->LFAPRESC0 & _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LCD_MASK)
01673                >> _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LCD_SHIFT)
01674               + CMU_DivToLog2(cmuClkDiv_16);
01675       break;
01676 
01677     case (CMU_LCD_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01678       ret = lfClkGet(cmuClock_LFA);
01679       ret >>= (CMU->LFAPRESC0 & _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LCD_MASK)
01680               >> _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LCD_SHIFT;
01681       ret /= 1U + ((CMU->LCDCTRL & _CMU_LCDCTRL_FDIV_MASK)
01682                    >> _CMU_LCDCTRL_FDIV_SHIFT);
01683       break;
01684 #endif
01685 
01686 #if defined(_CMU_LFACLKEN0_LESENSE_MASK)
01687     case (CMU_LESENSE_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01688       ret = lfClkGet(cmuClock_LFA);
01689       ret >>= (CMU->LFAPRESC0 & _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LESENSE_MASK)
01690               >> _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LESENSE_SHIFT;
01691       break;
01692 #endif
01693 
01694     case (CMU_LFB_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01695       ret = lfClkGet(cmuClock_LFB);
01696       break;
01697 
01698 #if defined( _CMU_LFBCLKEN0_LEUART0_MASK )
01699     case (CMU_LEUART0_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01700       ret = lfClkGet(cmuClock_LFB);
01701 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_1 )
01702       ret >>= (CMU->LFBPRESC0 & _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART0_MASK)
01703               >> _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART0_SHIFT;
01704 #elif defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
01705       ret /= CMU_Log2ToDiv((CMU->LFBPRESC0 & _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART0_MASK)
01706                            >> _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART0_SHIFT);
01707 #endif
01708       break;
01709 #endif
01710 
01711 #if defined( _CMU_LFBCLKEN0_LEUART1_MASK )
01712     case (CMU_LEUART1_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01713       ret = lfClkGet(cmuClock_LFB);
01714 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_1 )
01715       ret >>= (CMU->LFBPRESC0 & _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART1_MASK)
01716               >> _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART1_SHIFT;
01717 #elif defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
01718       ret /= CMU_Log2ToDiv((CMU->LFBPRESC0 & _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART1_MASK)
01719                            >> _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART1_SHIFT);
01720 #endif
01721       break;
01722 #endif
01723 
01724 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
01725     case (CMU_LFE_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01726       ret = lfClkGet(cmuClock_LFE);
01727       break;
01728 #endif
01729 
01730     case (CMU_DBG_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01731       ret = dbgClkGet();
01732       break;
01733 
01734     case (CMU_AUX_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01735       ret = auxClkGet();
01736       break;
01737 
01738 #if defined(USB_PRESENT)
01739     case (CMU_USBC_CLK_BRANCH << CMU_CLK_BRANCH_POS):
01740       ret = usbCClkGet();
01741       break;
01742 #endif
01743 
01744     default:
01745       EFM_ASSERT(0);
01746       ret = 0;
01747       break;
01748   }
01749 
01750   return ret;
01751 }
01752 
01753 
01754 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
01755 /***************************************************************************/
01767 uint32_t CMU_ClockPrescGet(CMU_Clock_TypeDef clock)
01768 {
01769   uint32_t  prescReg;
01770   uint32_t  ret;
01771 
01772   /* Get prescaler register id. */
01773   prescReg = (clock >> CMU_PRESC_REG_POS) & CMU_PRESC_REG_MASK;
01774 
01775   switch (prescReg)
01776   {
01777     case CMU_HFPRESC_REG:
01778       ret = ((CMU->HFPRESC & _CMU_HFPRESC_PRESC_MASK)
01779              >> _CMU_HFPRESC_PRESC_SHIFT);
01780       break;
01781 
01782     case CMU_HFEXPPRESC_REG:
01783       ret = ((CMU->HFEXPPRESC & _CMU_HFEXPPRESC_PRESC_MASK)
01784              >> _CMU_HFEXPPRESC_PRESC_SHIFT);
01785       break;
01786 
01787     case CMU_HFCLKLEPRESC_REG:
01788       ret = ((CMU->HFPRESC & _CMU_HFPRESC_HFCLKLEPRESC_MASK)
01789              >> _CMU_HFPRESC_HFCLKLEPRESC_SHIFT);
01790       break;
01791 
01792     case CMU_HFPERPRESC_REG:
01793       ret = ((CMU->HFPERPRESC & _CMU_HFPERPRESC_PRESC_MASK)
01794              >> _CMU_HFPERPRESC_PRESC_SHIFT);
01795       break;
01796 
01797 #if defined( _CMU_HFRADIOPRESC_PRESC_MASK )
01798     case CMU_HFRADIOPRESC_REG:
01799       ret = ((CMU->HFRADIOPRESC & _CMU_HFRADIOPRESC_PRESC_MASK)
01800              >> _CMU_HFRADIOPRESC_PRESC_SHIFT);
01801       break;
01802 #endif
01803 
01804     case CMU_HFCOREPRESC_REG:
01805       ret = ((CMU->HFCOREPRESC & _CMU_HFCOREPRESC_PRESC_MASK)
01806              >> _CMU_HFCOREPRESC_PRESC_SHIFT);
01807       break;
01808 
01809     case CMU_LFAPRESC0_REG:
01810       switch (clock)
01811       {
01812 #if defined( _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LETIMER0_MASK )
01813         case cmuClock_LETIMER0:
01814           ret = (((CMU->LFAPRESC0 & _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LETIMER0_MASK)
01815                  >> _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LETIMER0_SHIFT));
01816           /* Convert the exponent to prescaler value. */
01817           ret = CMU_Log2ToDiv(ret) - 1U;
01818           break;
01819 #endif
01820 
01821         default:
01822           EFM_ASSERT(0);
01823           ret = 0U;
01824           break;
01825       }
01826       break;
01827 
01828     case CMU_LFBPRESC0_REG:
01829       switch (clock)
01830       {
01831 #if defined( _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART0_MASK )
01832         case cmuClock_LEUART0:
01833           ret = (((CMU->LFBPRESC0 & _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART0_MASK)
01834                  >> _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART0_SHIFT));
01835           /* Convert the exponent to prescaler value. */
01836           ret = CMU_Log2ToDiv(ret) - 1U;
01837           break;
01838 #endif
01839 
01840 #if defined( _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART1_MASK )
01841         case cmuClock_LEUART1:
01842           ret = (((CMU->LFBPRESC0 & _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART1_MASK)
01843                  >> _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART1_SHIFT));
01844           /* Convert the exponent to prescaler value. */
01845           ret = CMU_Log2ToDiv(ret) - 1U;
01846           break;
01847 #endif
01848 
01849         default:
01850           EFM_ASSERT(0);
01851           ret = 0U;
01852           break;
01853       }
01854       break;
01855 
01856     case CMU_LFEPRESC0_REG:
01857       switch (clock)
01858       {
01859 #if defined( RTCC_PRESENT )
01860         case cmuClock_RTCC:
01861           /* No need to compute with LFEPRESC0_RTCC - DIV1 is the only  */
01862           /* allowed value. Convert the exponent to prescaler value.    */
01863           ret = _CMU_LFEPRESC0_RTCC_DIV1;
01864           break;
01865 
01866         default:
01867           EFM_ASSERT(0);
01868           ret = 0U;
01869           break;
01870 #endif
01871       }
01872       break;
01873 
01874     default:
01875       EFM_ASSERT(0);
01876       ret = 0U;
01877       break;
01878   }
01879 
01880   return ret;
01881 }
01882 #endif
01883 
01884 
01885 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
01886 /***************************************************************************/
01904 void CMU_ClockPrescSet(CMU_Clock_TypeDef clock, CMU_ClkPresc_TypeDef presc)
01905 {
01906   uint32_t freq;
01907   uint32_t prescReg;
01908 
01909   /* Get divisor reg id */
01910   prescReg = (clock >> CMU_PRESC_REG_POS) & CMU_PRESC_REG_MASK;
01911 
01912   switch (prescReg)
01913   {
01914     case CMU_HFPRESC_REG:
01915       EFM_ASSERT(presc < 32U);
01916 
01917       CMU->HFPRESC = (CMU->HFPRESC & ~_CMU_HFPRESC_PRESC_MASK)
01918                      | (presc << _CMU_HFPRESC_PRESC_SHIFT);
01919       break;
01920 
01921     case CMU_HFEXPPRESC_REG:
01922       EFM_ASSERT(presc < 32U);
01923 
01924       CMU->HFEXPPRESC = (CMU->HFEXPPRESC & ~_CMU_HFEXPPRESC_PRESC_MASK)
01925                         | (presc << _CMU_HFEXPPRESC_PRESC_SHIFT);
01926       break;
01927 
01928     case CMU_HFCLKLEPRESC_REG:
01929       EFM_ASSERT(presc < 2U);
01930 
01931       /* Specifies the clock divider for HFCLKLE. When running at frequencies
01932        * higher than 32 MHz, this must be set to DIV4. */
01933       CMU->HFPRESC = (CMU->HFPRESC & ~_CMU_HFPRESC_HFCLKLEPRESC_MASK)
01934                      | (presc << _CMU_HFPRESC_HFCLKLEPRESC_SHIFT);
01935       break;
01936 
01937     case CMU_HFPERPRESC_REG:
01938       EFM_ASSERT(presc < 512U);
01939 
01940       CMU->HFPERPRESC = (CMU->HFPERPRESC & ~_CMU_HFPERPRESC_PRESC_MASK)
01941                         | (presc << _CMU_HFPERPRESC_PRESC_SHIFT);
01942       break;
01943 
01944 #if defined( _CMU_HFRADIOPRESC_PRESC_MASK )
01945     case CMU_HFRADIOPRESC_REG:
01946       EFM_ASSERT(presc < 512U);
01947 
01948       CMU->HFRADIOPRESC = (CMU->HFRADIOPRESC & ~_CMU_HFRADIOPRESC_PRESC_MASK)
01949                           | (presc << _CMU_HFRADIOPRESC_PRESC_SHIFT);
01950       break;
01951 #endif
01952 
01953     case CMU_HFCOREPRESC_REG:
01954       EFM_ASSERT(presc < 512U);
01955 
01956       /* Configure worst case wait states for flash access before setting
01957        * the prescaler. */
01958       flashWaitStateControl(CMU_MAX_FREQ_0WS + 1);
01959 
01960       CMU->HFCOREPRESC = (CMU->HFCOREPRESC & ~_CMU_HFCOREPRESC_PRESC_MASK)
01961                          | (presc << _CMU_HFCOREPRESC_PRESC_SHIFT);
01962 
01963       /* Update CMSIS core clock variable */
01964       /* (The function will update the global variable) */
01965       freq = SystemCoreClockGet();
01966 
01967       /* Optimize flash access wait state setting for current core clk */
01968       flashWaitStateControl(freq);
01969       break;
01970 
01971     case CMU_LFAPRESC0_REG:
01972       switch (clock)
01973       {
01974 #if defined( RTC_PRESENT )
01975         case cmuClock_RTC:
01976           EFM_ASSERT(presc <= 32768U);
01977 
01978           /* Convert prescaler value to DIV exponent scale. */
01979           presc = CMU_PrescToLog2(presc);
01980 
01981           /* LF register about to be modified require sync. Busy check. */
01982           syncReg(CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFAPRESC0);
01983 
01984           CMU->LFAPRESC0 = (CMU->LFAPRESC0 & ~_CMU_LFAPRESC0_RTC_MASK)
01985                            | (presc << _CMU_LFAPRESC0_RTC_SHIFT);
01986           break;
01987 #endif
01988 
01989 #if defined( RTCC_PRESENT )
01990         case cmuClock_RTCC:
01991 #if defined( _CMU_LFEPRESC0_RTCC_MASK )
01992           /* DIV1 is the only accepted value. */
01993           EFM_ASSERT(presc <= 0U);
01994 
01995           /* LF register about to be modified require sync. Busy check.. */
01996           syncReg(CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFEPRESC0);
01997 
01998           CMU->LFEPRESC0 = (CMU->LFEPRESC0 & ~_CMU_LFEPRESC0_RTCC_MASK)
01999                            | (presc << _CMU_LFEPRESC0_RTCC_SHIFT);
02000 #else
02001           EFM_ASSERT(presc <= 32768U);
02002 
02003           /* Convert prescaler value to DIV exponent scale. */
02004           presc = CMU_PrescToLog2(presc);
02005 
02006           /* LF register about to be modified require sync. Busy check. */
02007           syncReg(CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFAPRESC0);
02008 
02009           CMU->LFAPRESC0 = (CMU->LFAPRESC0 & ~_CMU_LFAPRESC0_RTCC_MASK)
02010                            | (presc << _CMU_LFAPRESC0_RTCC_SHIFT);
02011 #endif
02012           break;
02013 #endif
02014 
02015 #if defined( _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LETIMER0_MASK )
02016         case cmuClock_LETIMER0:
02017           EFM_ASSERT(presc <= 32768U);
02018 
02019           /* Convert prescaler value to DIV exponent scale. */
02020           presc = CMU_PrescToLog2(presc);
02021 
02022           /* LF register about to be modified require sync. Busy check. */
02023           syncReg(CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFAPRESC0);
02024 
02025           CMU->LFAPRESC0 = (CMU->LFAPRESC0 & ~_CMU_LFAPRESC0_LETIMER0_MASK)
02026                            | (presc << _CMU_LFAPRESC0_LETIMER0_SHIFT);
02027           break;
02028 #endif
02029 
02030         default:
02031           EFM_ASSERT(0);
02032           break;
02033       }
02034       break;
02035 
02036     case CMU_LFBPRESC0_REG:
02037       switch (clock)
02038       {
02039 #if defined( _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART0_MASK )
02040         case cmuClock_LEUART0:
02041           EFM_ASSERT(presc <= 8U);
02042 
02043           /* Convert prescaler value to DIV exponent scale. */
02044           presc = CMU_PrescToLog2(presc);
02045 
02046           /* LF register about to be modified require sync. Busy check. */
02047           syncReg(CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFBPRESC0);
02048 
02049           CMU->LFBPRESC0 = (CMU->LFBPRESC0 & ~_CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART0_MASK)
02050                            | (presc << _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART0_SHIFT);
02051           break;
02052 #endif
02053 
02054 #if defined( _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART1_MASK )
02055         case cmuClock_LEUART1:
02056           EFM_ASSERT(presc <= 8U);
02057 
02058           /* Convert prescaler value to DIV exponent scale. */
02059           presc = CMU_PrescToLog2(presc);
02060 
02061           /* LF register about to be modified require sync. Busy check. */
02062           syncReg(CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFBPRESC0);
02063 
02064           CMU->LFBPRESC0 = (CMU->LFBPRESC0 & ~_CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART1_MASK)
02065                            | (presc << _CMU_LFBPRESC0_LEUART1_SHIFT);
02066           break;
02067 #endif
02068 
02069         default:
02070           EFM_ASSERT(0);
02071           break;
02072       }
02073       break;
02074 
02075     case CMU_LFEPRESC0_REG:
02076       switch (clock)
02077       {
02078 #if defined( _CMU_LFEPRESC0_RTCC_MASK )
02079         case cmuClock_RTCC:
02080           EFM_ASSERT(presc <= 0U);
02081 
02082           /* LF register about to be modified require sync. Busy check. */
02083           syncReg(CMU_SYNCBUSY_LFEPRESC0);
02084 
02085           CMU->LFEPRESC0 = (CMU->LFEPRESC0 & ~_CMU_LFEPRESC0_RTCC_MASK)
02086                            | (presc << _CMU_LFEPRESC0_RTCC_SHIFT);
02087           break;
02088 #endif
02089 
02090         default:
02091           EFM_ASSERT(0);
02092           break;
02093       }
02094       break;
02095 
02096     default:
02097       EFM_ASSERT(0);
02098       break;
02099   }
02100 }
02101 #endif
02102 
02103 
02104 /***************************************************************************/
02125 CMU_Select_TypeDef CMU_ClockSelectGet(CMU_Clock_TypeDef clock)
02126 {
02127   CMU_Select_TypeDef ret = cmuSelect_Disabled;
02128   uint32_t selReg;
02129 
02130   selReg = (clock >> CMU_SEL_REG_POS) & CMU_SEL_REG_MASK;
02131 
02132   switch (selReg)
02133   {
02134     case CMU_HFCLKSEL_REG:
02135 #if defined( _CMU_HFCLKSEL_HF_MASK )
02136       switch (CMU->HFCLKSEL & _CMU_HFCLKSEL_HF_MASK)
02137       {
02138         case CMU_HFCLKSEL_HF_LFXO:
02139           ret = cmuSelect_LFXO;
02140           break;
02141 
02142         case CMU_HFCLKSEL_HF_LFRCO:
02143           ret = cmuSelect_LFRCO;
02144           break;
02145 
02146         case CMU_HFCLKSEL_HF_HFXO:
02147           ret = cmuSelect_HFXO;
02148           break;
02149 
02150         default:
02151           ret = cmuSelect_HFRCO;
02152           break;
02153       }
02154 #else
02155       switch (CMU->STATUS
02156               & (CMU_STATUS_HFRCOSEL
02157                  | CMU_STATUS_HFXOSEL
02158                  | CMU_STATUS_LFRCOSEL
02159 #if defined( CMU_STATUS_USHFRCODIV2SEL )
02160                  | CMU_STATUS_USHFRCODIV2SEL
02161 #endif
02162                  | CMU_STATUS_LFXOSEL))
02163       {
02164         case CMU_STATUS_LFXOSEL:
02165           ret = cmuSelect_LFXO;
02166           break;
02167 
02168         case CMU_STATUS_LFRCOSEL:
02169           ret = cmuSelect_LFRCO;
02170           break;
02171 
02172         case CMU_STATUS_HFXOSEL:
02173           ret = cmuSelect_HFXO;
02174           break;
02175 
02176 #if defined( CMU_STATUS_USHFRCODIV2SEL )
02177         case CMU_STATUS_USHFRCODIV2SEL:
02178           ret = cmuSelect_USHFRCODIV2;
02179           break;
02180 #endif
02181 
02182         default:
02183           ret = cmuSelect_HFRCO;
02184           break;
02185       }
02186 #endif
02187       break;
02188 
02189     case CMU_LFACLKSEL_REG:
02190 #if defined( _CMU_LFCLKSEL_MASK )
02191       switch (CMU->LFCLKSEL & _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_MASK)
02192       {
02193         case CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_LFRCO:
02194           ret = cmuSelect_LFRCO;
02195           break;
02196 
02197         case CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_LFXO:
02198           ret = cmuSelect_LFXO;
02199           break;
02200 
02201 #if defined( CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_HFCORECLKLEDIV2 )
02202         case CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_HFCORECLKLEDIV2:
02203           ret = cmuSelect_CORELEDIV2;
02204           break;
02205 #endif
02206 
02207         default:
02208 #if defined( CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFAE )
02209           if (CMU->LFCLKSEL & _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFAE_MASK)
02210           {
02211             ret = cmuSelect_ULFRCO;
02212             break;
02213           }
02214 #else
02215           ret = cmuSelect_Disabled;
02216 #endif
02217           break;
02218       }
02219 #endif /* _CMU_LFCLKSEL_MASK */
02220 
02221 #if defined( _CMU_LFACLKSEL_MASK )
02222       switch (CMU->LFACLKSEL & _CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_MASK)
02223       {
02224         case CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_LFRCO:
02225           ret = cmuSelect_LFRCO;
02226           break;
02227 
02228         case CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_LFXO:
02229           ret = cmuSelect_LFXO;
02230           break;
02231 
02232         case CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_ULFRCO:
02233           ret = cmuSelect_ULFRCO;
02234           break;
02235 
02236 #if defined( _CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_HFCLKLE )
02237         case CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_HFCLKLE:
02238           ret = cmuSelect_HFCLKLE;
02239           break;
02240 #endif
02241 
02242         default:
02243           ret = cmuSelect_Disabled;
02244           break;
02245       }
02246 #endif
02247       break;
02248 
02249     case CMU_LFBCLKSEL_REG:
02250 #if defined( _CMU_LFCLKSEL_MASK )
02251       switch (CMU->LFCLKSEL & _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFB_MASK)
02252       {
02253         case CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFB_LFRCO:
02254           ret = cmuSelect_LFRCO;
02255           break;
02256 
02257         case CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFB_LFXO:
02258           ret = cmuSelect_LFXO;
02259           break;
02260 
02261 #if defined( CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFB_HFCORECLKLEDIV2 )
02262         case CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFB_HFCORECLKLEDIV2:
02263           ret = cmuSelect_CORELEDIV2;
02264           break;
02265 #endif
02266 
02267 #if defined( CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFB_HFCLKLE )
02268         case CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFB_HFCLKLE:
02269           ret = cmuSelect_HFCLKLE;
02270           break;
02271 #endif
02272 
02273         default:
02274 #if defined( CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFBE )
02275           if (CMU->LFCLKSEL & _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFBE_MASK)
02276           {
02277             ret = cmuSelect_ULFRCO;
02278             break;
02279           }
02280 #else
02281           ret = cmuSelect_Disabled;
02282 #endif
02283           break;
02284       }
02285 #endif /* _CMU_LFCLKSEL_MASK */
02286 
02287 #if defined( _CMU_LFBCLKSEL_MASK )
02288       switch (CMU->LFBCLKSEL & _CMU_LFBCLKSEL_LFB_MASK)
02289       {
02290         case CMU_LFBCLKSEL_LFB_LFRCO:
02291           ret = cmuSelect_LFRCO;
02292           break;
02293 
02294         case CMU_LFBCLKSEL_LFB_LFXO:
02295           ret = cmuSelect_LFXO;
02296           break;
02297 
02298         case CMU_LFBCLKSEL_LFB_ULFRCO:
02299           ret = cmuSelect_ULFRCO;
02300           break;
02301 
02302         case CMU_LFBCLKSEL_LFB_HFCLKLE:
02303           ret = cmuSelect_HFCLKLE;
02304           break;
02305 
02306         default:
02307           ret = cmuSelect_Disabled;
02308           break;
02309       }
02310 #endif
02311       break;
02312 
02313 #if defined( _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFC_MASK )
02314     case CMU_LFCCLKSEL_REG:
02315       switch (CMU->LFCLKSEL & _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFC_MASK)
02316       {
02317         case CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFC_LFRCO:
02318           ret = cmuSelect_LFRCO;
02319           break;
02320 
02321         case CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFC_LFXO:
02322           ret = cmuSelect_LFXO;
02323           break;
02324 
02325         default:
02326           ret = cmuSelect_Disabled;
02327           break;
02328       }
02329       break;
02330 #endif
02331 
02332 #if defined( _CMU_LFECLKSEL_LFE_MASK )
02333     case CMU_LFECLKSEL_REG:
02334       switch (CMU->LFECLKSEL & _CMU_LFECLKSEL_LFE_MASK)
02335       {
02336         case CMU_LFECLKSEL_LFE_LFRCO:
02337           ret = cmuSelect_LFRCO;
02338           break;
02339 
02340         case CMU_LFECLKSEL_LFE_LFXO:
02341           ret = cmuSelect_LFXO;
02342           break;
02343 
02344         case CMU_LFECLKSEL_LFE_ULFRCO:
02345           ret = cmuSelect_ULFRCO;
02346           break;
02347 
02348 #if defined ( _CMU_LFECLKSEL_LFE_HFCLKLE )
02349         case CMU_LFECLKSEL_LFE_HFCLKLE:
02350           ret = cmuSelect_HFCLKLE;
02351           break;
02352 #endif
02353 
02354         default:
02355           ret = cmuSelect_Disabled;
02356           break;
02357       }
02358       break;
02359 #endif /* CMU_LFECLKSEL_REG */
02360 
02361     case CMU_DBGCLKSEL_REG:
02362 #if defined( _CMU_DBGCLKSEL_DBG_MASK )
02363       switch (CMU->DBGCLKSEL & _CMU_DBGCLKSEL_DBG_MASK)
02364       {
02365         case CMU_DBGCLKSEL_DBG_HFCLK:
02366           ret = cmuSelect_HFCLK;
02367           break;
02368 
02369         case CMU_DBGCLKSEL_DBG_AUXHFRCO:
02370           ret = cmuSelect_AUXHFRCO;
02371           break;
02372       }
02373 #else
02374       ret = cmuSelect_AUXHFRCO;
02375 #endif /* CMU_DBGCLKSEL_DBG */
02376 
02377 #if defined( _CMU_CTRL_DBGCLK_MASK )
02378       switch(CMU->CTRL & _CMU_CTRL_DBGCLK_MASK)
02379       {
02380         case CMU_CTRL_DBGCLK_AUXHFRCO:
02381           ret = cmuSelect_AUXHFRCO;
02382           break;
02383 
02384         case CMU_CTRL_DBGCLK_HFCLK:
02385           ret = cmuSelect_HFCLK;
02386           break;
02387       }
02388 #else
02389       ret = cmuSelect_AUXHFRCO;
02390 #endif
02391       break;
02392 
02393 
02394 #if defined( USB_PRESENT )
02395     case CMU_USBCCLKSEL_REG:
02396       switch (CMU->STATUS
02397               & (CMU_STATUS_USBCLFXOSEL
02398 #if defined(_CMU_STATUS_USBCHFCLKSEL_MASK)
02399                  | CMU_STATUS_USBCHFCLKSEL
02400 #endif
02401 #if defined(_CMU_STATUS_USBCUSHFRCOSEL_MASK)
02402                  | CMU_STATUS_USBCUSHFRCOSEL
02403 #endif
02404                  | CMU_STATUS_USBCLFRCOSEL))
02405       {
02406 #if defined(_CMU_STATUS_USBCHFCLKSEL_MASK)
02407         case CMU_STATUS_USBCHFCLKSEL:
02408           ret = cmuSelect_HFCLK;
02409           break;
02410 #endif
02411 
02412 #if defined(_CMU_STATUS_USBCUSHFRCOSEL_MASK)
02413         case CMU_STATUS_USBCUSHFRCOSEL:
02414           ret = cmuSelect_USHFRCO;
02415           break;
02416 #endif
02417 
02418         case CMU_STATUS_USBCLFXOSEL:
02419           ret = cmuSelect_LFXO;
02420           break;
02421 
02422         case CMU_STATUS_USBCLFRCOSEL:
02423           ret = cmuSelect_LFRCO;
02424           break;
02425 
02426         default:
02427           ret = cmuSelect_Disabled;
02428           break;
02429       }
02430       break;
02431 #endif
02432 
02433     default:
02434       EFM_ASSERT(0);
02435       ret = cmuSelect_Error;
02436       break;
02437   }
02438 
02439   return ret;
02440 }
02441 
02442 
02443 /***************************************************************************/
02483 void CMU_ClockSelectSet(CMU_Clock_TypeDef clock, CMU_Select_TypeDef ref)
02484 {
02485   uint32_t        select = cmuOsc_HFRCO;
02486   CMU_Osc_TypeDef osc    = cmuOsc_HFRCO;
02487   uint32_t        freq;
02488   uint32_t        tmp;
02489   uint32_t        selRegId;
02490 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
02491   volatile uint32_t *selReg = NULL;
02492 #endif
02493 #if defined( CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFAE_ULFRCO )
02494   uint32_t        lfExtended = 0;
02495 #endif
02496 
02497   selRegId = (clock >> CMU_SEL_REG_POS) & CMU_SEL_REG_MASK;
02498 
02499   switch (selRegId)
02500   {
02501     case CMU_HFCLKSEL_REG:
02502       switch (ref)
02503       {
02504         case cmuSelect_LFXO:
02505 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
02506           select = CMU_HFCLKSEL_HF_LFXO;
02507 #elif defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_1 )
02508           select = CMU_CMD_HFCLKSEL_LFXO;
02509 #endif
02510           osc = cmuOsc_LFXO;
02511           break;
02512 
02513         case cmuSelect_LFRCO:
02514 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
02515           select = CMU_HFCLKSEL_HF_LFRCO;
02516 #elif defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_1 )
02517           select = CMU_CMD_HFCLKSEL_LFRCO;
02518 #endif
02519           osc = cmuOsc_LFRCO;
02520           break;
02521 
02522         case cmuSelect_HFXO:
02523           osc = cmuOsc_HFXO;
02524 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
02525           select = CMU_HFCLKSEL_HF_HFXO;
02526           /* Adjust HFXO buffer current for high frequencies, */
02527           /* enable WSHFLE for frequencies above 32MHz.       */
02528           if (SystemHFXOClockGet() > 32000000)
02529           {
02530             CMU->CTRL |= CMU_CTRL_WSHFLE;
02531           }
02532 #elif defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_1 )
02533           select = CMU_CMD_HFCLKSEL_HFXO;
02534 #if defined( CMU_CTRL_HFLE )
02535           /* Adjust HFXO buffer current for high frequencies,     */
02536           /* enable HFLE for frequencies above CMU_MAX_FREQ_HFLE. */
02537           if(SystemHFXOClockGet() > CMU_MAX_FREQ_HFLE())
02538           {
02539             CMU->CTRL = (CMU->CTRL & ~_CMU_CTRL_HFXOBUFCUR_MASK)
02540                         | CMU_CTRL_HFXOBUFCUR_BOOSTABOVE32MHZ
02541             /* Must have HFLE enabled to access some LE peripherals >=32MHz */
02542                         | CMU_CTRL_HFLE;
02543 
02544             /* Set HFLE and DIV4 factor for peripheral clock if HFCORE  */
02545             /* clock for LE is enabled.                                 */
02546             if (CMU->HFCORECLKEN0 & CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_LE)
02547             {
02548               BUS_RegBitWrite(&CMU->HFCORECLKDIV,
02549                               _CMU_HFCORECLKDIV_HFCORECLKLEDIV_SHIFT, 1);
02550             }
02551           }
02552           else
02553           {
02554             /* This can happen if the user configures the EFM32_HFXO_FREQ to */
02555             /* use another oscillator frequency */
02556             CMU->CTRL = (CMU->CTRL & ~_CMU_CTRL_HFXOBUFCUR_MASK)
02557                         | CMU_CTRL_HFXOBUFCUR_BOOSTUPTO32MHZ;
02558           }
02559 #endif
02560 #endif
02561           break;
02562 
02563         case cmuSelect_HFRCO:
02564 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
02565           select = CMU_HFCLKSEL_HF_HFRCO;
02566 #elif defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_1 )
02567           select = CMU_CMD_HFCLKSEL_HFRCO;
02568 #endif
02569           osc = cmuOsc_HFRCO;
02570           break;
02571 
02572 #if defined( CMU_CMD_HFCLKSEL_USHFRCODIV2 )
02573         case cmuSelect_USHFRCODIV2:
02574           select = CMU_CMD_HFCLKSEL_USHFRCODIV2;
02575           osc = cmuOsc_USHFRCO;
02576           break;
02577 #endif
02578 
02579 #if defined( CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFAE_ULFRCO ) || defined( CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_ULFRCO )
02580         case cmuSelect_ULFRCO:
02581           /* ULFRCO cannot be used as HFCLK  */
02582           EFM_ASSERT(0);
02583           return;
02584 #endif
02585 
02586         default:
02587           EFM_ASSERT(0);
02588           return;
02589       }
02590 
02591       /* Ensure selected oscillator is enabled, waiting for it to stabilize */
02592       CMU_OscillatorEnable(osc, true, true);
02593 
02594       /* Configure worst case wait states for flash access before selecting */
02595       flashWaitStateMax();
02596 
02597       /* Switch to selected oscillator */
02598 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
02599       CMU->HFCLKSEL = select;
02600 #elif defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_1 )
02601       CMU->CMD = select;
02602 #endif
02603 
02604       /* Keep EMU module informed */
02605       EMU_UpdateOscConfig();
02606 
02607       /* Update CMSIS core clock variable */
02608       /* (The function will update the global variable) */
02609       freq = SystemCoreClockGet();
02610 
02611       /* Optimize flash access wait state setting for currently selected core clk */
02612       flashWaitStateControl(freq);
02613       break;
02614 
02615 #if defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_2 )
02616     case CMU_LFACLKSEL_REG:
02617       selReg = (selReg == NULL) ? &CMU->LFACLKSEL : selReg;
02618 #if !defined( _CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_HFCLKLE )
02619       /* HFCLKCLE can not be used as LFACLK */
02620       EFM_ASSERT(ref != cmuSelect_HFCLKLE);
02621 #endif
02622     case CMU_LFECLKSEL_REG:
02623       selReg = (selReg == NULL) ? &CMU->LFECLKSEL : selReg;
02624 #if !defined( _CMU_LFECLKSEL_LFE_HFCLKLE )
02625       /* HFCLKCLE can not be used as LFECLK */
02626       EFM_ASSERT(ref != cmuSelect_HFCLKLE);
02627 #endif
02628     case CMU_LFBCLKSEL_REG:
02629       selReg = (selReg == NULL) ? &CMU->LFBCLKSEL : selReg;
02630       switch (ref)
02631       {
02632         case cmuSelect_Disabled:
02633           tmp = _CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_DISABLED;
02634           break;
02635 
02636         case cmuSelect_LFXO:
02637           /* Ensure selected oscillator is enabled, waiting for it to stabilize */
02638           CMU_OscillatorEnable(cmuOsc_LFXO, true, true);
02639           tmp = _CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_LFXO;
02640           break;
02641 
02642         case cmuSelect_LFRCO:
02643           /* Ensure selected oscillator is enabled, waiting for it to stabilize */
02644           CMU_OscillatorEnable(cmuOsc_LFRCO, true, true);
02645           tmp = _CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_LFRCO;
02646           break;
02647 
02648         case cmuSelect_HFCLKLE:
02649           /* Ensure HFCORE to LE clocking is enabled */
02650           BUS_RegBitWrite(&CMU->HFBUSCLKEN0, _CMU_HFBUSCLKEN0_LE_SHIFT, 1);
02651           tmp = _CMU_LFBCLKSEL_LFB_HFCLKLE;
02652 
02653           /* If core frequency is > 32MHz enable WSHFLE */
02654           freq = SystemCoreClockGet();
02655           if (freq > 32000000U)
02656           {
02657             /* Enable CMU HFLE */
02658             BUS_RegBitWrite(&CMU->CTRL, _CMU_CTRL_WSHFLE_SHIFT, 1);
02659 
02660             /* Enable DIV4 factor for peripheral clock */
02661             BUS_RegBitWrite(&CMU->HFPRESC, _CMU_HFPRESC_HFCLKLEPRESC_SHIFT, 1);
02662           }
02663           break;
02664 
02665         case cmuSelect_ULFRCO:
02666           /* ULFRCO is always on, there is no need to enable it. */
02667           tmp = _CMU_LFACLKSEL_LFA_ULFRCO;
02668           break;
02669 
02670         default:
02671           EFM_ASSERT(0);
02672           return;
02673       }
02674       *selReg = tmp;
02675       break;
02676 
02677 #elif defined( _SILICON_LABS_32B_PLATFORM_1 )
02678     case CMU_LFACLKSEL_REG:
02679     case CMU_LFBCLKSEL_REG:
02680       switch (ref)
02681       {
02682         case cmuSelect_Disabled:
02683           tmp = _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_DISABLED;
02684           break;
02685 
02686         case cmuSelect_LFXO:
02687           /* Ensure selected oscillator is enabled, waiting for it to stabilize */
02688           CMU_OscillatorEnable(cmuOsc_LFXO, true, true);
02689           tmp = _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_LFXO;
02690           break;
02691 
02692         case cmuSelect_LFRCO:
02693           /* Ensure selected oscillator is enabled, waiting for it to stabilize */
02694           CMU_OscillatorEnable(cmuOsc_LFRCO, true, true);
02695           tmp = _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_LFRCO;
02696           break;
02697 
02698         case cmuSelect_CORELEDIV2:
02699           /* Ensure HFCORE to LE clocking is enabled */
02700           BUS_RegBitWrite(&(CMU->HFCORECLKEN0), _CMU_HFCORECLKEN0_LE_SHIFT, 1);
02701           tmp = _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_HFCORECLKLEDIV2;
02702 #if defined( CMU_CTRL_HFLE )
02703           /* If core frequency is higher than CMU_MAX_FREQ_HFLE on
02704              Giant/Leopard/Wonder, enable HFLE and DIV4. */
02705           freq = SystemCoreClockGet();
02706           if(freq > CMU_MAX_FREQ_HFLE())
02707           {
02708             /* Enable CMU HFLE */
02709             BUS_RegBitWrite(&CMU->CTRL, _CMU_CTRL_HFLE_SHIFT, 1);
02710 
02711             /* Enable DIV4 factor for peripheral clock */
02712             BUS_RegBitWrite(&CMU->HFCORECLKDIV,
02713                             _CMU_HFCORECLKDIV_HFCORECLKLEDIV_SHIFT, 1);
02714           }
02715 #endif
02716           break;
02717 
02718 #if defined( CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFAE_ULFRCO )
02719         case cmuSelect_ULFRCO:
02720           /* ULFRCO is always enabled */
02721           tmp = _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_DISABLED;
02722           lfExtended = 1;
02723           break;
02724 #endif
02725 
02726         default:
02727           /* Illegal clock source for LFA/LFB selected */
02728           EFM_ASSERT(0);
02729           return;
02730       }
02731 
02732       /* Apply select */
02733       if (selRegId == CMU_LFACLKSEL_REG)
02734       {
02735 #if defined( _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFAE_MASK )
02736         CMU->LFCLKSEL = (CMU->LFCLKSEL
02737                          & ~(_CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_MASK | _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFAE_MASK))
02738                         | (tmp << _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_SHIFT)
02739                         | (lfExtended << _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFAE_SHIFT);
02740 #else
02741         CMU->LFCLKSEL = (CMU->LFCLKSEL & ~_CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_MASK)
02742                         | (tmp << _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_SHIFT);
02743 #endif
02744       }
02745       else
02746       {
02747 #if defined( _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFBE_MASK )
02748         CMU->LFCLKSEL = (CMU->LFCLKSEL
02749                          & ~(_CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFB_MASK | _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFBE_MASK))
02750                         | (tmp << _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFB_SHIFT)
02751                         | (lfExtended << _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFBE_SHIFT);
02752 #else
02753         CMU->LFCLKSEL = (CMU->LFCLKSEL & ~_CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFB_MASK)
02754                         | (tmp << _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFB_SHIFT);
02755 #endif
02756       }
02757       break;
02758 
02759 #if defined( _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFC_MASK )
02760     case CMU_LFCCLKSEL_REG:
02761       switch(ref)
02762       {
02763         case cmuSelect_Disabled:
02764           tmp = _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFA_DISABLED;
02765           break;
02766 
02767         case cmuSelect_LFXO:
02768           /* Ensure selected oscillator is enabled, waiting for it to stabilize */
02769           CMU_OscillatorEnable(cmuOsc_LFXO, true, true);
02770           tmp = _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFC_LFXO;
02771           break;
02772 
02773         case cmuSelect_LFRCO:
02774           /* Ensure selected oscillator is enabled, waiting for it to stabilize */
02775           CMU_OscillatorEnable(cmuOsc_LFRCO, true, true);
02776           tmp = _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFC_LFRCO;
02777           break;
02778 
02779         default:
02780           /* Illegal clock source for LFC selected */
02781           EFM_ASSERT(0);
02782           return;
02783       }
02784 
02785       /* Apply select */
02786       CMU->LFCLKSEL = (CMU->LFCLKSEL & ~_CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFC_MASK)
02787                       | (tmp << _CMU_LFCLKSEL_LFC_SHIFT);
02788       break;
02789 #endif
02790 #endif
02791 
02792 #if defined( CMU_DBGCLKSEL_DBG ) || defined( CMU_CTRL_DBGCLK )
02793     case CMU_DBGCLKSEL_REG:
02794       switch(ref)
02795       {
02796 #if defined( CMU_DBGCLKSEL_DBG )
02797         case cmuSelect_AUXHFRCO:
02798           /* Select AUXHFRCO as debug clock */
02799           CMU->DBGCLKSEL = CMU_DBGCLKSEL_DBG_AUXHFRCO;
02800           break;
02801 
02802         case cmuSelect_HFCLK:
02803           /* Select divided HFCLK as debug clock */
02804           CMU->DBGCLKSEL = CMU_DBGCLKSEL_DBG_HFCLK;
02805           break;
02806 #endif
02807 
02808 #if defined( CMU_CTRL_DBGCLK )
02809         case cmuSelect_AUXHFRCO:
02810           /* Select AUXHFRCO as debug clock */
